thread.title: Wichita District to Use Bus Drivers as Custodians - Education Week

title: Wichita District to Use Bus Drivers as Custodians - Education Week
text:
Published Online: September 21, 2015 Published in Print: September 23, 2015, as Wichita District to Use Bus Drivers as Custodians News in Brief Wichita District to Use Bus Drivers as Custodians 
The Wichita, Kan., school district says it plans to use bus drivers as part-time custodians as part of a pilot program to keep schools clean and costs down. 
School board members were planning last week to consider a contract with First Student to provide workers to clean cafeterias at 16 elementary schools this semester. First Student is ...
